    public class SelectASingle<T>

      • oneOf

        public static <R extends PersistableObject,​Q extends javax.jdo.query.PersistableExpression<R>> SelectASingle<R> oneOf​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelect,
                                                                                                                            JDOQLQueryParameters<R,​Q> params)
        Retrieves a single PersistableObject selected by query
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        Q - is a type of PersistableExpression that represents T in query
        Parameters:
        toSelect - is a class of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        params - is an instance of JDOQLQueryParameters that describes how to select desired object
        Returns:
        new SelectASingle

      • row

        public static <R extends PersistableObject,​Q extends javax.jdo.query.PersistableExpression<R>> SelectASingle<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> row​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelectFrom,
                                                                                                                                                         JDOQLResultQueryParams<R,​Q> params)
        Retrieves a list of field values taken from a single one PersistableObject that selected by query.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to take field values from
        Q - is a type of PersistableExpression that represents T in query
        Parameters:
        toSelectFrom - is a class of resulted PersistableObject to take field values from
        params - is an instance of JDOQLResultQueryParams that describes how to select desired object
        Returns:
        new SelectASingle

        public static <R extends PersistableObject> SelectASingle<R> oneOf​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelect,
                                                                   Id id)
        Retrieves a single PersistableObject selected by known id.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        Parameters:
        toSelect - is a class of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        id - is a wrapper of known id used to find the desired object

        public static <R extends PersistableObject> SelectASingle<R> oneOf​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelect)
        Retrieves the first selected PersistableObject

        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to be returned

      • oneOf

        public static <R extends PersistableObject> SelectASingle<R> oneOf​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelect,
                                                                   java.lang.String sql,
                                                                   java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Retrieves a single PersistableObject selected by sql-query.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        Parameters:
        toSelect - is a class of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter mask (?) is supported. It is important!:

        Sql query should be defined as below

        'Select * from Persons...'
        parameters - is an array of query parameters. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=?'

        Returns:
        new SelectASingle

      • oneOf

        public static <R extends PersistableObject> SelectASingle<R> oneOf​(java.lang.Class<R> toSelect,
                                                                   java.lang.String sql,
                                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​?> parameters)
        Retrieves a single PersistableObject selected by sql-query.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        Parameters:
        toSelect - is a class of resulted PersistableObject to be returned
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter naming is supported. It is important!:

        Sql query should be defined as below

        'Select * from Persons...'
        parameters - is a map of parameter names and values. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=:paramName'

        Returns:
        new SelectASingle

      • row

        public static <R extends DBConnectionSupplier> SelectASingle<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> row​(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<R> connection,
                                                                                                   java.lang.Object... parameters)
        Retrieves a list of raw objects taken from record of a data store. This record is selected by sql query.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of DBConnectionSupplier
        Parameters:
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter mask (?) is supported.
        connection - is an class of DBConnectionSupplier that actually describes how to connect and how to use the data store
        parameters - is an array of query parameters. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=?'

        Returns:
        new SelectASingle

      • row

        public static <R extends DBConnectionSupplier> SelectASingle<java.util.List<java.lang.Object>> row​(java.lang.String sql,
                                                                                                   java.lang.Class<R> connection,
                                                                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​?> parameters)
        Retrieves a list of raw objects taken from record of a data store. This record is selected by sql query.
        Type Parameters:
        R - is a type of DBConnectionSupplier
        Parameters:
        sql - is an sql query. Parameter naming is supported.
        connection - is an class of DBConnectionSupplier that actually describes how to connect and how to use the data store
        parameters - is a map of parameter names and values. It is necessary to define for queries as below

        'Select * from Persons where Some_Field=:paramName'

        Returns:
        new SelectASingle
